About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi I'm a Software Developer.

I'm interested in pursuing a career as a Front End Developer and am currently learning React.

NAB

Data Analyst Engineer

As a Data Analyst Engineer at NAB, I'm responsible for implementing changes to support new functionality. Technical skills include PL/SQL, Unix (Solaris) and SQL (Oracle).

Infosys

Associate Developer

As an Associate Developer at Infosys under their graduate program, I underwent their associate training in Java and SQL (Oracle). Upon being placed in a project, I further upskilled in my specialised stream (Data Analyst at NAB).

Thiru Service Centre

Software Developer

Software Developer and Client Liaison, creating a new system utilising Agile to assist in the day-to-day operations of the business as part of Industry Experience. Mainly focusing on Front End Development, ensuring deliverables are fulfilled in each iteration, CRM Development, documentation, writing User Stories, conducting Test Cases, orchestrating meetings and writing Meeting Minutes, as well as ensuring seamless communication between teams, the client and our mentors.
